title: Amount of students claiming to identify as trans, non-binary SURGE at one state's university system
description:
Not even a decade ago, your average college student would not even know what the term ‚Äúnon-binary‚Äù meant. But now, University of California campuses are seeing a dramatic rise in students identifying as non-binary and transgender.

The left will claim this is due to societal acceptance. But if that were true then we would see more and more people out of college identifying as such. But we are not. At best, we are arguably seeing a social contagion and more and more students craving to be included in some ‚Äúvictim‚Äù class, combined with degeneracy.

title: These weirdo progressive climate cultists are now upset the Earth is TOO green: "Often, with dire consequences"
description:

title: Watch: High school sophomore shatters state's high jump record. Of course, she's a dude...
description:
